title: Go Forth, Go Forth With Christ
author: Anonymous

verses.text:
Go forth, go forth with Christ,
Who called you to this day, He
who has led, will lead And keep you in His way:
His promise sure To all who serve Him and endure.

Go forth, go forth with Christ,
With purpose not your own, Each
victory you shall gain Through Him your Lord alone:
To guard you His Spirit shall your strength be.

Go forth, go forth with Christ,
His Priesthood you shall share, Who
bought us by His blood To be His servants here:
Walk in the way your Savior trod, Go forth with God.
